title: Onionless chicken stew
ingredients: ['800ml water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, diced', '2 medium or large potatoes, peeled and diced', '3 carrots, peeled and sliced', '1 handful green beans, chopped into inch long pieces', '3 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '3 (1 in) cubes salted butter', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 handful fresh flat leaf parsley, roughly chopped', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '2 whole dried bay leaves', '4 to 5 leaves savoy cabbage, sliced into long strips', '2 teaspoons prepared English mustard', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 vegetable stock pots', '1/3 glass red wine']
